item.title: Version 2.3.9
item.description:
[2.3.9] - 2026-02-05

Added

  • Auto-Updates: Automatic update checking on macOS and Windows
  • Check for updates via Help → "Check for Updates..."
  • Background update checks with user-friendly install dialog
  • Uses Sparkle (macOS) and WinSparkle (Windows)
  • Code Signing: macOS releases are now signed and notarized
  • No more Gatekeeper warnings or "damaged app" messages
  • Automatic notarization through Apple's notary service
  • HTML Help System: Native help viewer on macOS (replaces CHM)
  • Export v1.x Compatible: New File menu option to export circuits for older CedarLogic versions (v1.5, v1.8, etc.)
  • macOS Input Support:
  • Trackpad scroll-to-pan (hold Cmd + scroll)
  • Delete key (backspace) now works for deleting gates
  • Open files directly from Finder (double-click or drag-to-icon)

Fixed

  • Crash when clicking after undo deletes a gate (#64)
  • Paste operation now properly cancels when pressing Escape (#67)
  • macOS scroll/zoom behavior: scroll = zoom, Cmd+scroll = pan
  • Added = key for zoom in (in addition to +)

Changed

  • Build Improvements:
  • Added build caching for faster CI (~3-5x speedup on cache hits)
  • Package filenames now match release tag version
  • macOS builds are arm64 only (Apple Silicon native)

Infrastructure

  • Automated release workflow with signing, notarization, and appcast updates
  • GitHub Pages hosts update feed at taciturnaxolotl.github.io/CedarLogic
  • Wiki documentation for CI/CD and release process

Full Changelog: https://github.com/taciturnaxolotl/CedarLogic/compare/v2.3.8...v2.3.9
